description:
Easy to use, adds menu items to Ubuntu easily for apps/scripts.
Only problem is I can't figure out how to launch it from outside the software store
summary: Great tool for adding menu items

description: This install created a file in the usr share applications folder off the root named mozo.desktop. From the terminal, you can type mozo or mozo & to launch it. With elevated privileges, you can edit the .desktop file and remove the line that says something along the lines of OnlyShowIn=MATE, save it and then it will appear in Ubuntu's apps as 'Main Menu'.

At first I thought it was the answer I've been looking for... until I moved things around and then it F'd up my menus.

Safer for tweaking menus slightly rather than making drastic changes. So about as safe as time travel.

i cant find it in my apps and it lunchs only from ubuntu software.
anyway it works fine
summary: easy to use, hard to lunch

summary: not able to find in menu

description: Beim löschen von Anwendungen bleiben öfter die Einträge erhalten wen man die manuell löscht dann die Anwendung wieder installiert wird kein Eintrag erstellt. Einige Anwendungen sind nach der Installation gar nicht zu finden man muss Manuel den Eintrag schreiben, hier bekommt man keine Unterstützer (Vorschläge für autocomplete).
summary: Menü Leichen bleiben, neues nicht zu finden manchmal
